titlestmt.titleproper: Presbyterian Ministers' Association of Denver records 1891-1902
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Presbyterian Ministers' Association of Denver records

bioghist.p: The Presbyterian Ministers' Association of Denver was a group formed, possibly in 1891, with the object of mutual help of the brethren and conferences on the work committed to their care.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of minutes of monthly meetings of the Presbyterian Ministers' Association of Denver, 1891-1902. Minutes record the Club's routine business, and list discussion topics and reports by committees. The minutes also include the Association's constitution, and a list of Presbyterian pastors of Denver and vicinity, circa 1902.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
